title: How to turn off Sponsored search suggestions in the top URL bar
content:
When I click on the URL bar after opening Firefox to a blank page, it automatically gives me some recommendations (such as some of my bookmarks), but the top recommendations it gives me are 2 "sponsored" suggestions for 2 websites. It says "sponsored". Putting sponsored results in the top of the URL bar is too much.

The sponsored results go away when I start typing, but the sponsored results shouldn't be there in the first place.

Is there a way to turn these sponsored suggestions off?

I have auto-update turned on so I'm guessing I have the latest version of Firefox. I'm on Windows 10.
creator: michael.26.murrin

title: Taskbar
content: I want to see my taskbar when using Firefox full screen. I work on battery power alot and need to see this all the time. I cannot work in a less than full screen. I hope there is a fix for this or I'll have to go back to Google (I much prefer Firefox). My operating system is Windows 10.
creator: jjames93011

title: Yahoo email won't open/ stay open in v. 86.0.1
content: I like the tabbed browsing in Firefox over Chrome but Yahoo email keeps crashing and won't refresh. Even after closing and reopening the browser nothing happens. Or I get the message 'no internet connection.' In Chrome Yahoo never goes down. What's going on here? Thanks.
creator: gj.olson

title: Firefox not loading anything, blank including inability to open options
content:
after updating windows earlier today my firefox browser wouldnt open new tabs, but i was able to still browse on open tabs like chaning between youtube videos or browse through reddit, but when trying to open options or a new tab to visit a website firefox is just blank, no attempts to load or anything, as if the internet doesn't exist. The internet works just fine on any other browser including edge and chrome.

I've tried refreshing, running in safe mode, restarting my computer, and even uninstalling/reinstalling. Nothing is woking sadly, if anyone could help me with this id appreciate it.
creator: mcloughlins

title: attachment paper clip function stoped working.
content: sending out email want to send an attachment, but attachment no longer works. I uninstalled & reinstalled firefox but the attachment problem still exist. Help!
creator: kwisniewski

title: video issues after refresing
content: I refreshed my Firefox and now when I go to stream FIOS TV through my home computer connected directly to the router, I get the error message DRM: licenser error! --com.widevine.alpha update, XHR error. status is "" (0), readyState is 4. DRM is checked off in my settings and the widevine plugin is enabled. HELP
creator: horses721
